text: @senatemajldr Requiring companies to give paid sick leave to workers with Coronavirus is NOT special treatment for Big Labor and you are trying to give the president 500 Billion to hand out to companies that support him, possibly even his own company, without any oversight.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
